text:
At the corner of the city stands the
café "Moment". People gather there.

Though each movement may be small,
the interlocking gears will surely turn someday──

"I'm at the table on the right
side at the back of the shop."

Haha,
Yui, you're still as thoughtful as ever──

Sorry for calling you out...!
There's something I want to discuss.

Oh, have you eaten? If not, go ahead and order!
Everything here is delicious──

...Sorry, I've been talking too much.
Please, have a seat.

Haha, thank you.
Well, if everything is delicious...

...Maybe I'll have the curry rice. It seems delicious,
especially after being prepared for three days.

Haha, as expected.
Curry rice is a classic!

Oh, that sounds exciting.
So, Yui, about the discussion?

Ah, it's about our magazine's mix-and-match outfit feature.
We're focusing on female web designers this time.

It's perfect for Saya... If you don't mind,
could you share your usual stories and such?

I see, that's what it's about.
Feel free to ask me anything.

─But before that, where's the file?
Did you accidentally dirty it?

Oh, right.
I dropped it earlier.

A kind person nearby helped me pick it up,
which was really lucky...

That's...
fortunate to have encountered someone so helpful.

Yeah, she had distinct features...
I wonder if she'll come back here again.
